name: ListUtils_indexOfTest
description: Unit tests for the ListUtils.indexOf method.

test_cases.name: testIndexOf_Found
test_cases.description: Tests the ListUtils.indexOf method to find the index of an element that matches a predicate.

test_cases.name: testIndexOf_NotFound
test_cases.description: Tests the ListUtils.indexOf method when no element matches the predicate.

test_cases.name: testIndexOf_NullList
test_cases.description: Tests the ListUtils.indexOf method when the list is null.

test_cases.name: testIndexOf_NullPredicate
test_cases.description: Tests the ListUtils.indexOf method when the predicate is null.
